channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: prasanth_j can you take a look?
This looks reasonable, but you need to add some unit tests.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12878852/HIVE-17172.patch

prasanth_j owen.omalley djaiswal ping
actually there's a bug in the test will update it
+1 Lgtm.
sershe Can you please put the next patch in RB? It is much easier to review that way.

Added some comments to the usage of the method (that I needed to look at to fix the test).
Fixed the test to actually test something, and altered one test case that is valid and shouldn't cause an error.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:

Thanks for adding comments. As far as I understand it looks good. An RB link would have been more helpful in understanding the code though.

+1
Committed to master and branch-2. Thanks for the reviews!

Hmm, I forgot the special case of the mutation helper. Would need to fix before release
prasanth_j can you please take a look? a tiny addendum patch
q79969786 thanks for catching this!
Committed to branches.
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
